document.full_text: a two-day strike over rising fuel prices turned violent in shanghai on thursday as thousands of truck drivers clashed with police, drivers said, in the latest example of simmering discontent over inflation.
document.title: clashes erupt in shanghai as truck drivers strike near port
lines_and_colors: a two-day strike over rising fuel prices turned violent in shanghai on thursday as thousands of truck drivers clashed with police, drivers said, in the latest example of simmering discontent over inflation.
